addComment(string).details: Public function for authorized users to create comments on the given dispute.

params._reason: Short string defining the reason for the dispute
params._workInstance: The EthlanceWorkContract parent instance for this Dispute.
params.metahash: A structure IPFS data structure defined by a hash string. The hash is stored as the employer or the candidate depending on is_employer_request.

isResolved().details: Returns true if the current dispute is resolved.

leaveFeedback(uint256,string).details: Leave feedback for the arbiter in the given Dispute.

resolve(uint256,address,uint256,address,.details: Resolves the dispute between the employer and the candidate, and pays the employer and the candidate's the given amounts.

params._arbiterAmount: The amount of tokens to pay the arbiter for resolution.
params._arbiterToken: The token address of the type of token, set to 0x0 for ETH.
params._candidateAmount: The amount of tokens to pay the candidate for resolution.
params._candidateToken: The token address of the type of token, set to 0x0 for ETH.
params._employerAmount: The amount of tokens to pay the employer for resolution.
params._employerToken: The token address of the type of token, set to 0x0 for ETH.
